column5: a Chinese man driving a luxury ------BMW------  at high speeds crashed into concrete barriers at the front of the “Park Sun” garment factory
column7: Chak Angre Krom commune. Khan Mean Chey.------Before the incident
column8: a BMW X5 was driving erratically along National Road 2 at a very fast speed. The driver is reported to have been very drunk.------After the crash
column9: the vehicle was taken to Phnom Penh Capital Hall’s Traffic Police Office to wait for legal damages to be paid.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/269723------ ------ ------ ------.
